lead_paragraph: Portugal coach Fernando Santos turned to teenager Renato Sanches in a bid to bring some fluency to the midfield in their Euro 2016 quarter-final against Poland on Thursday and was handsomely rewarded for the decision.

headline.print_headline: Portugal Coach Reaps Handsome Reward for Picking Teenager Sanches
headline.main: Portugal Coach Reaps Handsome Reward for Picking Teenager Sanches
